summary: Your weapons, magic and shout only do damage to the enemy.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]Description[/size]
Your weapons, magic and shout（include modded spells） only do damage to the enemy.

[size=5]How to use[/size]
1.the Injury management system will effect immediately after installation.
2.when you snakeing or hand-to-hand-melee, the Injury management system will fail temporarily.

[size=5]install
[/size]you can install/uninstall this mod in any time



中文版：[url=http://magicskyrim.com]http://magicskyrim.com
[/url]禁止转载分流
author: grsfeng
